name: ENO, the world before
description:
The game "ENO - the World Before" is a 2D platform game (ORI like), with a large map and includes 3D enigma where the player has to find the game rules himself.

ENO is a lost soul fragment that will cause the end of its world and Expansion of our universe. The different levels occur before BIGBANG with level 1 in this breadboard, and after BIGBANG starting from the energy plasma of the universe until our Milky way and Earth creation (Level 2 to 9).

Download the game in its breadboard version on Windows PC (not to be sold, neither distributed).

You want to be part of ENO community, as gamer or developper, follow the WEB SITE http://tali.nakache.free.fr/indexEn.html
